text:
The [[Ghaal'dar]] of [[Darguun]] are an alliance of [[goblinoid]] tribes. The Lhesh [[Haruuc Shaarat'kor]] belongs to the largest of these, the Rhukaan Taash. The name means “Razor Crown,” and a line of scars encircles the head of each Rhukaan warrior, the
result of a ritual marking when a [[hobgoblin]] becomes a soldier.
title: Rhukaan Taash
